title: Node stuck, sync false
body:
#### System information

Geth version: `Geth/v1.10.3-stable-991384a7/windows-amd64/go1.16.3`
OS & Version: Windows
Commit hash : (if `develop`)

#### Expected behaviour


#### Actual behaviour
Status is always sync false:
Welcome to the Geth JavaScript console!

instance: Geth/v1.10.3-stable-991384a7/windows-amd64/go1.16.3
at block: 12427059 (Thu May 13 2021 23:19:36 GMT+0700 (+07))
 datadir: D:\geth
 modules: admin:1.0 debug:1.0 eth:1.0 ethash:1.0 miner:1.0 net:1.0 personal:1.0 rpc:1.0 txpool:1.0 web3:1.0

To exit, press ctrl-d
> eth.syncing
false
> eth.blockNumber
12427091
>

WARN [05-13|23:22:24.879] Synchronisation failed, dropping peer    peer=b43a87c50a1e1b5c3c8d4211e311a522e5d7fcb23449fd93cc801c549c56ff34 err=timeout
ERROR[05-13|23:22:24.896] Ethereum peer removal failed             peer=b43a87c5 err="peer not registered"
INFO [05-13|23:23:12.809] Downloader queue stats                   receiptTasks=0 blockTasks=0 itemSize=52.29KiB throttle=1254
INFO [05-13|23:23:15.220] Imported new chain segment               blocks=2  txs=538  mgas=29.642  elapsed=1.029s    mgasps=28.804  number=12,427,076 hash=40e43b..a75a2d age=1m2s   dirty=209.43MiB
INFO [05-13|23:23:15.248] Unindexed transactions                   blocks=2  txs=216  tail=10,077,077 elapsed=3.526ms
INFO [05-13|23:23:16.307] Imported new chain segment               blocks=2  txs=410  mgas=29.641  elapsed=1.063s    mgasps=27.881  number=12,427,078 hash=4d6d3d..e60300 dirty=213.33MiB
INFO [05-13|23:23:16.335] Unindexed transactions                   blocks=2  txs=367  tail=10,077,079 elapsed=7.782ms
INFO [05-13|23:23:16.881] Imported new chain segment               blocks=1  txs=185  mgas=14.987  elapsed=540.103ms mgasps=27.749  number=12,427,079 hash=f91a52..176e72 dirty=215.06MiB
INFO [05-13|23:23:16.899] Unindexed transactions                   blocks=1  txs=134  tail=10,077,080 elapsed=2.377ms
INFO [05-13|23:23:17.225] Imported new chain segment               blocks=1  txs=179  mgas=14.799  elapsed=321.544ms mgasps=46.025  number=12,427,080 hash=354705..d71492 dirty=216.58MiB
INFO [05-13|23:23:17.243] Unindexed transactions                   blocks=1  txs=92   tail=10,077,081 elapsed=1.124ms
INFO [05-13|23:23:17.938] Imported new chain segment               blocks=1  txs=238  mgas=14.988  elapsed=689.702ms mgasps=21.731  number=12,427,081 hash=2a5b18..cb6604 dirty=218.57MiB
INFO [05-13|23:23:17.954] Unindexed transactions                   blocks=1  txs=0    tail=10,077,082 elapsed=1.001ms
INFO [05-13|23:23:18.406] Imported new chain segment               blocks=1  txs=255  mgas=14.800  elapsed=446.865ms mgasps=33.120  number=12,427,082 hash=f68426..fbf830 dirty=220.50MiB

INFO [05-13|23:23:19.617] Unindexed transactions                   blocks=1  txs=219  tail=10,077,084 elapsed=2.944ms

#### Steps to reproduce the behaviour


#### Backtrace

````
[backtrace]
````

When submitting logs: please submit them as text and not screenshots.

Your node is up to date with the current network, so its not syncing anymore.
You can see in the logs that your node imported a block from 1 minute ago (`age=1m2s`) which means its in sync.
```
INFO [05-13|23:23:15.220] Imported new chain segment blocks=2 txs=538 mgas=29.642 elapsed=1.029s mgasps=28.804 number=12,427,076 hash=40e43b..a75a2d age=1m2s dirty=209.43MiB
```
Syncing is only set to true if your node needs to initially synchronize with the network
